name: gatsby-starter-default
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby
author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy-s: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=staging gatsby build && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting --token $FIREBASE_TOKEN && firebase open hosting:site
scripts.deploy-p: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=production gatsby build && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only hosting --token $FIREBASE_TOKEN && firebase open hosting:site
scripts.deploy-s-force: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=staging gatsby build && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting && firebase open hosting:site
scripts.deploy-p-force: gatsby clean && GATSBY_ACTIVE_ENV=production gatsby build && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only hosting && firebase open hosting:site
scripts.deploy-s-functions: firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-p-functions: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
